items.sentence: Would you have time to drop this off at Tom's on your way to work?
I want to talk to you about what happened in Australia last month.
Tom and Mary have been spending a lot more time together recently.
I don't know whether to buy these brown shoes or those black ones.
I never thought someone from Australia could be so good at French.
It's not the first time I've been wrong, and it won't be the last.
I'll stay with you through both the happy times and the sad times.
Tom was shorter than the other students in his kindergarten class.
Tom said that Mary was the one who was responsible for doing that.
The thought of having to work with someone like you makes me sick.
